action.comment: Actions while Prismatic Crystal is active

action_detail.name: arcane_barrage
action_detail.description:
Launches bolts of arcane energy at the enemy target, causing $s1 Arcane damage. Consumes all Arcane Charges.
Arcane Barrage's damage is increased by $36032s1% per Arcane Charge, and it hits $36032s3 additional nearby $Ltarget:targets; per Arcane Charge for $44425s2% damage.
Replaces Fire Blast.

action_detail.name: arcane_blast
action_detail.description:
Blasts the target with energy, dealing $30451s1 Arcane damage and generating an Arcane Charge.
Arcane Blast's damage is increased by $36032s1% per Arcane Charge, and its mana cost is increased by $36032s2% per Arcane Charge.$?s86209[
Also applies the Slow spell to any target it damages.][]
Replaces Frostfire Bolt.

action_detail.name: arcane_missiles
action_detail.description:
Launches five waves of Arcane Missiles at the enemy over $5143d, causing $7268s1 Arcane damage per wave. Generates an Arcane Charge.
Arcane Missiles' damage is increased by $36032s1% per Arcane Charge.
Arcane Missiles has a chance to be activated after each of your damaging spell casts. Limit $79683s1 charges.

action_detail.name: arcane_power
action_detail.tooltip: Spell damage increased by $w1%. Mana costs of your damaging spells $?$w2=10[increased][reduced] by $w2%.
action_detail.description: When activated, you deal $s1% more spell damage and damaging spells cost $s2% $?p99064|?s157614[less][more] mana to cast. $?s56381[While Arcane Power is active, the global cooldown of your Blink, Mana Shield, and Mirror Image is reduced to zero. ][]This effect lasts $D.

action_detail.name: evocation
action_detail.tooltip: Gain $w1% of total mana every $t1 sec.
action_detail.description: Gain $m1% of your total mana instantly and another ${3*$m1}% of your total mana over $d.

action_detail.name: presence_of_mind
action_detail.tooltip: Your next Mage spell will be an instant cast spell. Does not apply to Polymorph, Portal, or Teleport spells.
action_detail.description: Causes your next Mage spell to be instant. Does not apply to Polymorph, Portal, or Teleport spells.

action_detail.name: prismatic_crystal
action_detail.description:
Conjures a prismatic crystal at the target location, which is attackable by only the Mage, and takes $?s84714[$s3][$155153s1]% additional damage.
When the crystal takes damage, it instantly releases a burst of energy dealing that damage, split evenly between all enemies within 8 yards.

action_detail.name: supernova
action_detail.description:
Causes a pulse of arcane energy around the target enemy or ally, dealing $s2 Arcane damage to all enemies within $A2 yards, and knocking them upward. A primary enemy target will take $s1% increased damage. Max 2 charges
Replaces Frost Nova.

action_detail.name: arcane_blast
action_detail.description:
Blasts the target with energy, dealing $30451s1 Arcane damage and generating an Arcane Charge.
Arcane Blast's damage is increased by $36032s1% per Arcane Charge, and its mana cost is increased by $36032s2% per Arcane Charge.$?s86209[
Also applies the Slow spell to any target it damages.][]
Replaces Frostfire Bolt.

action_detail.name: supernova
action_detail.description:
Causes a pulse of arcane energy around the target enemy or ally, dealing $s2 Arcane damage to all enemies within $A2 yards, and knocking them upward. A primary enemy target will take $s1% increased damage. Max 2 charges
Replaces Frost Nova.
